channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Super Micro shares plunge 17% after company says no timetable for annual results, issues weak guidance
item.description: Super Micro, the embattled server maker, reported preliminary first-quarter results on Tuesday.

item.title: The Fight for 7-Eleven Isn't Just About Money
item.description: Corporate Japan circles the wagons to protect a national gem, but investor trust will be key.

item.title: Tencent posts better-than-expected 47% profit surge as games, AI tools shine
item.description: Chinese gaming and social media giant Tencent on Wednesday reported profit above analysts' expectations, while revenue missed slightly.

item.title: Stock Futures Up as Investors Await PPI Data
item.description: Stock futures were slightly higher ahead of producer-price index data.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock surges almost 30% to near all-time high after company's Q3 results
item.description: Rocket Lab jumped in trading after the company reported third-quarter results.

item.title: Sonos Begins a Very Long Road Back
item.description: The speaker maker’s holiday quarter forecast is lifting its stock, but fallout from last spring’s app fiasco still lingers.

item.title: Cisco reports fourth straight quarter of declining revenue
item.description: Cisco reported better-than-expected results for the latest quarter but revenue continues to shrink.

item.title: Why Goldman Stands Out as a Trump-Era Winner on Wall Street
item.description: Booms in dealmaking and private credit would be a double boost for the investment bank.

item.title: Europe's Gas Prices Surge to 2024 High on Stronger Demand
item.description: European natural-gas prices reached their highest level this year on expectations colder weather will boost demand and accelerate drawdowns.

item.title: Here's what to expect when Disney reports before the bell
item.description: Disney reports its fiscal fourth quarter earnings before the bell — here's what to expect.
